Citation

Kim AY, Ismay C and Chunn J (2018). “The fivethirtyeight R Package: 'Tame Data' Principles for Introductory Statistics and Data Science Courses.” Technology Innovations in Statistics Education, 11. https://escholarship.org/uc/item/0rx1231m.
